entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android API 34 app startup crash #19023
  • BindableObject.SetValueCore null reference crash #19021
  • BindingExpression.Apply null reference crash #19020
  • App size is too large in Release mode with several native binded libraries #19019
  • The MAUI team does not respond to issues with any urgency... THIS IS **THE** ISSUE!!! #19018
  • ScrollView does not scroll when is inside a StackLayout #19017
  • [tests] The windows Frame device tests fail with : No installed components were detected. #19015
  • Scrollview not scrolling with open keyboard when content fits in screen #19014
  • BlazorWebView does not initialize properly on Android platform #19013
  • [iOS] Building the MAUI base app raise warnings with RuntimeIdentifier=ios-arm64 #19012
  • [iOS] Layout issue (regression, worked correct in MAUI 7) #19011
  • WebView in android forget user login credentials every app restart #19010
  • GraphcView: Draw method of Drawable constantly fires #19009
  • Publish iOS App via cmd - Asset Validation failed #19008
  • Visibility Issues: Incomplete Label Display on macOS and IOS When Padding is Applied #19007
  • Navigation to modal page #19006
  • Scrollview scrolling not works after updating .NET 8 in MAC and iOS platforms #19005
  • [Windows]Clicking on Snackbar should not open a new instance of the application #19003
  • [MAUI] VS exits debug mode after changing Android Emulator Settings while playing an animation #19002
  • [MAUI] Enabling Remove Animations won't make Label 2 of the F2 page visible #19001
  • [MAUI] Enabling Battery Saver won't make both labels (Label 1, Label 2) of the F1 page fully visible immediately #19000
  • Button HeightRequest value not applying lesser than default value #18999
  • FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync Does not work on Xiaomi phones, still can only select one, not multiple #18998
  • Navigation page back button does not work on iOS12 #18997

Closed

  • Platform View Null on a Custom Control #18847
  • [MacCatalyst]RadioButton does not display button #14485
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨

Updated

  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main) #18953
  • [Testing] Add Layout UITests #18923
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of MaximumTrackColor on Slider when using Mac Idiom #18990
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18943
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18942
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18941
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
